item.title: Help with runecraft altar
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

case 2478: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if (actionTimer == 0) { setAnimation(791); addItem(561, 10); addItem(565, 10); addItem(560, 10); addItem(562, 10); addItem(554, 10); addItem(555 10); addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[20]), 20); sendMessage("You pray at the altar.. You get some Runes and some Runecrafting experience!"); actionTimer = 45; } } break;

There’s mines. To stop people from massing it and getting the reward rapidly, all that is needed is a simple actionTimer. Well, you can add items, change the amount of that item, change the message and modify the timer. Remember, higher the number the longer the Timer. I suggest putting it higher, say, 57 or so. You can change the ObjectID aswell…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with runecraft altar
item.dc:creator: @Hyphy_Guy Hyphy Guy
item.description:
@Hyphy_Guy wrote:

CraftRunesRift(“nats”, 1, 50, 561, 3, 50, 791);
CraftRunesRift(“ns”, 1, 50, 560, 3, 50, 791);
CraftRunesRift(“nas”, 1, 50, 565, 3, 50, 791);
CraftRunesRift(“nat”, 1, 50, 566, 3, 50, 791);
CraftRunesRift(“ts”, 1, 50, 555, 3, 50, 791);

This what I got how do I make it craft all of these runes at one time.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 10, 2007, 06:42:16 PM[/size][hr]Anyone help?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 10, 2007, 06:52:06 PM[/size][hr]Can someone help me please?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 11, 2007, 08:07:10 PM[/size][hr]Still in need of help.
